english_example_sentence: Let's assume that you reported this important news to the manager.
russian_example_sentence: Предположим, ты сообщил эту важную новость руководителю.
turkish_example_sentence: Farz edelim ki, sen bu önemli haberi müdüre bildirmişsin.
